title: Janhvi Kapoor confesses she takes pillows from hotels , recalls her shoplifting experience
body_text:
Janhvi Kapoor confesses she takes pillows from hotels, recalls her shoplifting experience
Janhvi Kapoor, currently enjoying the success of Mr and Mrs Mahi, revealed in an interview her habit of taking pillows from hotels she stays at. She also spoke about her experience with shoplifting as a child. Her recent release, Mr and Mrs Mahi has earned Rs 20.85 crore in 5 days, making it Janhvi's highest opening film.
